Description.Neutral:
[b]Homefront is a small to mid-sized asymmetrical BTB map set in New Mombasa, designed to offer a fast paced gameplay experience.[/b]


[h1]Created By[/h1]
Map Design by [I][url=https://twitter.com/The_Grim_Dealer]ShmeeGrim/The Grim Dealer[/url][/i] & [I][url=https://twitter.com/SirVeyza]Sir Veyza/url][/i]

Environment Art by [I][url=https://twitter.com/The_Grim_Dealer]ShmeeGrim/The Grim Dealer[/url][/i]

Custom Signage by [I][url=https://twitter.com/SirVeyza]Sir Veyza/url][/i]
